channel.title: Missing Gui?
channel.description: I click run.bat, a message box pops up, and says Could not find main class: Gui, Program will exit, I'm pretty sure it's not working because the person that released it took out the gui.java and gui.class, since they are not in the folder anywhere, If there is any way to get it working please help.

item.title: Missing Gui?
item.dc:creator: @_Haste1 #Haste
item.description:
@_Haste1 wrote:

revjester:

I click run.bat, a message box pops up, and says Could not find main class: Gui, Program will exit, I’m pretty sure it’s not working because the person that released it took out the gui.java and gui.class, since they are not in the folder anywhere, If there is any way to get it working please help.

Client Folder > Java > Make new Gui.txt (Rename it .Java) > Add all of this inside it.
http://pastebin.com/XTDLzDPJ

Compile, run

Read full topic
